src:
Timnas U-19 Tekuk Timor Leste, Ini Kata Fajar Fathur Cetak 2 Gol
06 Nov 2019, 15:51 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- Penyerang Timnas U-19, Muhammad Fajar Fathur, mengatakan keberhasilan mengalahkan Timor Leste dengan skor 3-1 karena kerja keras dari tim. Pemain yang mencetak dua gol dalam ini mengatakan bahwa laga melawan Timor Leste selalu berada dalam emosional yang tinggi. "Alhamdullillah kami bisa mengatasi itu semua," kata dia di Stadion Madya, Jakarta, 6 November 2019.
Fajar Fathur mengaku punya kiat khusus untuk tidak terpancing permainan kasar dari pemain lawan. Ia menyebutkan fokus menjalankan strategi dari pelatih Fakhri Husaini. "Kami bisa menjaga emosi karena arahan dari coach," kata dia.
Tim Nasional Indonesia U-19 atau Timnas U-19 mengalahkan Timor Leste U-19 dengan skor 3-1 dalam laga pertama babak Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 Grup K di Stadion Madya, Gelora Bung Karno, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Timnas U-19 mencetak gol cepat lewat Muhammad Fajar Fathur pada menit ke-2. Gol ini berawal dari tendangan sudut Beckham Putra yang diselesaikan dengan baik oleh Fajar lewat sundulan kepala. Gol ini membuat skuat Garuda Muda unggul 1-0 pada babak pertama.
Timor Leste U-19 berhasil menyamakan kedudukan lewat gol Mouzinho De Lima yang sukses menjadi algojo tendangan penalti pada menit ke-51. Wasit memberikan hadiah tendangan penalti setelah kiper Ernando Ari Sutaryadi melakukan pelanggaran di kotak penalti ketika menghalau pergerakan pemain Timor Leste.
Pada menit ke-59, pemain Timor Leste, Nelson Pinto diganjar kartu merah oleh wasit karena melakukan pelanggaran kepada Bagus Kahfi. Nelson melakukan tendangan dengan mengangkat kaki hingga mengenai muka Bagus.
Keunggulan jumlah pemain tak disia-siakan pemain Timnas U-19. Mereka terus melancarkan serangan ke pertahanan Timor Leste. Pada menit ke-62, kapten Timnas U-19, David Maulana mencetak gol kedua bagi Indonesia. Umpan dari Fajar Fathur diselesaikan dengan tendangan keras dari luar kotak penalti.
Pada menit ke-77, Fajar menambah keunggulan bagi Timnas U-19. Ia sukses menyelesaikan umpan silang dari Supriadi, pemain yang masuk menggantikan Sutan Diego Armando Zico pada menit ke-53.

IRSYAN HASYIM
text:
U-19 National Team Bends East Timor, This Said Fajar Fathur Print 2 Goals
Nov 06 2019, 15:51 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- U-19 national team attacker, Muhammad Fajar Fathur, said that he defeated Timor Leste 3-1 because of the team's hard work. The player who scored two goals in this said that the match against Timor Leste was always in a high emotional state. "Thank God we can overcome it all," he said at Madya Stadium, Jakarta, November 6, 2019.
Fajar Fathur claimed to have special tips for not being provoked by rough games from opposing players. He mentioned the focus on implementing the strategy of coach Fakhri Husaini. "We can maintain emotions because of the direction of the coach," he said.
Indonesian U-19 National Team or U-19 national team defeated East Timor U-19 with a score of 3-1 in the first match of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup Group K at Madya Stadium, Gelora Bung Karno, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday, 6 November 2019.
U-19 national team scored a quick goal through Muhammad Fajar Fathur in the 2nd minute. This goal started from Beckham Son's corner kick that was completed well by Fajar through a header. This goal makes the Garuda Muda squad winning 1-0 in the first round.
Timor Leste U-19s managed to equalize through Mouzinho De Lima's goal which was a penalty executioner in the 51st minute. The referee awarded a penalty after goalkeeper Ernando Ari Sutaryadi committed a foul in the penalty box while fending off the movement of East Timor players.
In the 59th minute, East Timorese Nelson Pinto was rewarded by a referee for a foul on Bagus Kahfi. Nelson takes the kick by raising his foot to hit Bagus's face.
The superiority of the number of players is not wasted U-19 national team players. They continued to carry out attacks on the defense of East Timor. In the 62nd minute, the U-19 national team captain, David Maulana scored the second goal for Indonesia. Bait from Fajar Fathur completed with a hard kick from outside the penalty box.
In the 77th minute, Fajar added an advantage for the U-19 national team. He successfully completed a cross from Supriadi, the player who came on for Sutan Diego Armando Zico in the 53rd minute.

IRSYAN HASYIM
